resources.string: You Win! Enjoy the next level!

Use touchscreen and drag and drop to place game card on the corresponding column. Also you can just using touches on the columns and physical keyboard 1, 2, 3, 4 keys.

The object is to use all the cards by making combinations of 21 on any of the 4 column. If you succeed, you WIN the next level. The deck is NOT standard: suits are replaced by Snooders.

Easy level is 32 cards. Medium level is 45 cards. Both Hard and Evil levels are 58 cards. The deck on each level includes 6 wild cards. A WILD card can be placed on any column for an automatic 21. If 5 cards on one column total less than 21, you are awarded the 21. An ACE is worth 1 or 11. J, Q, K are all worth 10.

When a 21 is made, the column is cleared and can be used to build another 21. If a column total is greater then 21, the column is frozen. You MUST play a card until the deck is used, OR all columns are frozen, OR time runs out.

The value of making a 21 is worth more from left to right (100-400 points).

You also get additional 50 points for each card placed in a column. When out of cards, you get 200 bonus points for every card on the screen.

The game ends when time runs out (there are 3 and less minutes) or all 4 columns are frozen. In the fourth Evil level, you win the game when all the deck cards are used.

This game is my remake of Motorola's standard game: Snood™ 21. Game uses drawing via SurfaceView Canvas.
• © 2016 S. "EXL" KLS
